# include<iostream>
# include<cstdio>
# include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,j,l,k,u;
    string a,b;
    while(cin>>t)
    {
         while(t--)
         {
                 //string a,b;
                 cin>>a;//cout<<a<<endl;
                 //fflush(stdin);
                 cin>>b;//cout<<b<<endl;
                 fflush(stdin);
                 //k=checkpalin(b);
                 j=u=0;
                 l=a.length();
                 k=l-1;
                 for(i=0;i<l;++i)
                 {
                                 if(a[i]==b[j])
                                 ++j;
                                 if(a[k]==b[u])
                                 ++u;
                                 --k;
                 }
                 l=b.length();
                 if(j==l && u==l)
                 cout<<"3";
                 else if(j==l)
                 cout<<"1";
                 else if(u==l)
                 cout<<"2";
                 else
                 cout<<"0";
                 cout<<endl;
                 cin.ignore();
         }
    }
    return 0;
}
